card.name: Spider-Man
card.property: Spider-Sense â€” Interrupt: When the villain initiates an attack against you, draw 1 card.
"Just your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man!"

alternate.name: Peter Parker
alternate.property: Scientist â€” Resource: Generate a [mental] resource. (Limit once per round.)
"Right now, I'd trade the whole Spider-Man bit for a rocking chair and a good book."

card.name: Black Cat
card.property: Forced Response: After you play Black Cat, discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Add each card with a printed [mental] resource discarded this way to your hand.
"I'm not a hero, I'm a thief."

card.name: Backflip
card.property: Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent all of that damage.
"Have you been training? 'Cause that almost hit me." -- Spider-Man

card.name: Enhanced Spider-Sense
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects.
"My spider-sense is tingling" -- Spider-Man

card.name: Swinging Web Kick
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 8 damage to an enemy.
"tally-ho!" -- Spider-Man

card.name: Aunt May
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Aunt May â†’ heal 4 damage from Peter Parker.
"Goodness, Peter! You've been so clumsy lately."

card.name: Spider-Tracer
card.property: Attach to a minion. Forced Interrupt: When attached minion is defeated, remove 3 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Web-Shooter
card.property: Uses (3 web counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Hero Resource: Exhaust Web-Shooter and remove 1 web counter from it â†’ generate a [wild] resource.

card.name: Webbed Up
card.property: Hero form only. Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy would attack, discard Webbed Up instead. Then, stun that enemy.

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Rechannel â€” Action: Spend a [energy] resource and heal 1 damage from Captain Marvel â†’ draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
"I never quit."

alternate.name: Carol Danvers
alternate.property: Commander â€” Action: Choose a player to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
"It's my job to protect the Earth and everyone on it."

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: Response: After Spider-Woman enters play, confuse the villain.
"This is what I wanted: helping the innocents by hospitalizing the guilty."

card.name: Crisis Interdiction
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Then, if you have the [[Aerial]] trait, remove 2 threat from a different scheme.
"This is one of the more impressive messes I've ever seen." -- Carol Danvers

card.name: Photonic Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, draw 1 card.

card.name: Energy Absorption
card.property: "That's enough!" -- Carol Danvers

card.name: Alpha Flight Station
card.property: Action: Exhaust Alpha Flight Station, choose and discard 1 card from your hand â†’ draw 1 card (draw 2 cards instead if you are Carol Danvers).
This low-orbit space station can beam cargo and crew to and from the Triskelion

card.name: Captain Marvel's Helmet
card.property: Captain Marvel gets +1 DEF (+2 DEF instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).
"This is so cool!" -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Cosmic Flight
card.property: Captain Marvel gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Interrupt (defense): When Captain Marvel would take damage, discard Cosmic Flight â†’ prevent 3 of that damage.

card.name: Energy Channel
card.property: Max 1 per player. Action: Spend X [energy] resources â†’ put X energy counters here. Hero Action (attack): Discard Energy Channel â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 10) for each energy counter here.

card.name: She-Hulk
card.property: "Do You Even Lift?" â€” Response: After you change to this form, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
"I'm six foot seven and bright green! People are gonna stare no matter how I dress."

alternate.name: Jennifer Walters
alternate.property: "I Object!" â€” Interrupt: When threat would be placed on a scheme, prevent 1 of that threat. (Limit once per round.)
"I can turn into a Hulk anytime I want. But just because you can do something doesn't always mean you should.

card.name: Hellcat
card.property: Action: Return Hellcat to your hand.
"Turn around gentlemen, and meet -- the Hellcat!"

card.name: Gamma Slam
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal X damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 15). X is the amount of damage you have sustained.
"You messed with the wrong woman!" -- She-Hulk

card.name: Ground Stomp
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to each enemy.
"These boots were made for stompin'." -- She-Hulk

card.name: Legal Practice
card.property: Alter-Ego Action (thwart): Choose and discard up to 5 cards from your hand â†’ remove 1 threat from a scheme for each card discarded this way.
"That's the first time I've ever seen someone argue their way out of a fight." -- Spider-Man

card.name: One-Two Punch
card.property: Response: After you make a basic attack (using your ATK), ready She-Hulk.
"I just don't care for men with fresh mouths." -- Jennifer Walters

card.name: Split Personality
card.property: Action: Change your form (flip your identity card). Then, draw up to your printed hand size.
"I know a thing or two about rage. And that kind of fury... it's not going to pass without taking someone with it." -- Jennifer Walters

card.name: Superhuman Law Division
card.property: Alter-Ego Action (thwart): Exhaust Superhuman Law Division and spend a [mental] resource â†’ remove 2 threat from a scheme.
"I'll be sending you a bill. My time is valuable these days." -- Jennifer Walters

card.name: Focused Rage
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Focused Rage and take 1 damage â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Superhuman Strength
card.property: She-Hulk gets +2 ATK. Forced Response: After She-Hulk attacks, discard Superhuman Strength â†’ stun the attacked enemy.

card.name: Iron Man
card.property: You get +1 hand size for each [[Tech]] upgrade you control (to a maximum hand size of 7).
"I am Iron Man."

alternate.name: Tony Stark
alternate.property: Futurist â€” Action: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the others. (Limit once per round.)
"I'm obviously not doing this for the money..."

card.name: War Machine
card.property: Action: Exhaust War Machine and deal 2 damage to him â†’ deal 1 damage to each enemy.
"Is this a private war -- or can anyone join?"

card.name: Repulsor Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to an enemy and discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each printed [energy] resource discarded this way, deal 2 additional damage to that enemy.

card.name: Supersonic Punch
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy (8 damage instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).
"Nice technique. But if you do it like this... it hurts more." -- Tony Stark

card.name: Pepper Potts
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Pepper Potts â†’ generate the resources of the top card in your discard pile.
"Do your thing. I've got this."

card.name: Stark Tower
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Stark Tower â†’ choose a player. That player returns the topmost [[Tech]] upgrade in their discard pile to their hand.
"I was hoping for something a little bigger. But this will do." -- Tony Stark

card.name: Arc Reactor
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Arc Reactor â†’ ready Iron Man.
"When I put on this armor, I took on more power than any human was ever intended to have... and maybe more responsibility than my heart can truly bear." -- Tony Stark

card.name: Mark V Armor
card.property: You get +6 hit points.
"Is that all you've got!" -- Tony Stark

card.name: Mark V Helmet
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust Mark V Helmet â†’ remove 1 threat from a scheme (from each scheme instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).
"Tony, are you sure you want to do that!" -- P.E.P.P.E.R.

card.name: Powered Gauntlets
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Powered Gauntlets â†’ deal 1 damage to an enemy (2 damage instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).
"Please, let me give you... a hand." -- Tony Stark

card.name: Rocket Boots
card.property: You get +1 hit point. Hero Action: Exhaust Rocket Boots and spend a [mental] resource â†’ gain the [[Aerial]] trait until the end of the phase.

card.name: Black Panther
card.property: Retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)
"To attack me is to attack Wakanda."

alternate.name: T'Challa
alternate.property: Foresight - Setup: Search your deck for a [[Black Panther]] upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Shuri
card.property: Response: After Shuri enters play, search your deck for an upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"You would be lost without me, brother!"

card.name: Ancestral Knowledge
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Choose up to 3 different cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.
"In Wakanda, we draw strength from the knowledge of our ancestors." -- T'Challa

card.name: Wakanda Forever!
card.property: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

card.name: Wakanda Forever!
card.property: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

card.name: Wakanda Forever!
card.property: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

card.name: Wakanda Forever!
card.property: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

card.name: Vibranium
card.property: "Since the time of Bashenga, we've controlled our destiny as few other nations have."

card.name: The Golden City
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust The Golden City â†’ draw 2 cards.
Wakanda's capital city is an unrivaled architectural and technological marvel.

card.name: Energy Daggers
card.property: Special: Choose a player. Deal 1 damage to the villain and to each enemy engaged with that player (2 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

card.name: Panther Claws
card.property: Special (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy (4 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

card.name: Tactical Genius
card.property: Special (thwart): Remove 1 threat from a scheme (2 threat instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

card.name: Vibranium Suit
card.property: Special (attack): Move 1 damage from your hero to an enemy (2 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

card.name: Hulk
card.property: Forced Response: After Hulk attacks, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. [energy] - Deal 1 damage to each character. [mental] - Discard Hulk. [wild] - All of the above.

card.name: Tigra
card.property: Response: After Tigra attacks and defeats a minion, heal 1 damage from her.
"Sorry -- no autographs."

card.name: Chase Them Down
card.property: Response (thwart): After your hero attacks and defeats an enemy, remove 2 threat from a scheme.
"Kamala, we don't have a theme song. Please stop humming one..." -- Captain Marvel

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to a minion. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, this attack gains overkill. (Excess damage from this attack is dealt to the villain.)

card.name: Uppercut
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy.
SMACK!

card.name: The Power of Aggression
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Aggression (red) card.

card.name: Tac Team
card.property: Uses (3 attack counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Action: Exhaust Tac Team and remove 1 attack counter from it â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Combat Training
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Your hero gets +1 ATK.
"Tony! She did it again!" -- Janet Van Dyne

card.name: Jessica Jones
card.property: Jessica Jones gets +1 THW for each side scheme in play.
"I am very good at finding people."

card.name: Daredevil
card.property: Response: After Daredevil thwarts, deal 1 damage to an enemy.
"Sometimes, I think I accomplish more with my fists than with my law firm."

card.name: For Justice!
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme (4 threat instead if you paid for this card using a [mental] resource).
"You lose. And you're going to answer for what you've done." -- Captain America

card.name: Great Responsibility
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme, you take it as damage instead.

card.name: The Power of Justice
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Justice (yellow) card.

card.name: Interrogation Room
card.property: Max 1 per player. Response: After you defeat a minion, exhaust Interrogation Room â†’ remove 1 threat from a scheme.
"Oh, she's sorry! Let me get the keys and call you a car service!" -- Misty Knight

card.name: Surveillance Team
card.property: Uses (3 snoop counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Action: Exhaust Surveillance Team and remove 1 snoop counter from it â†’ remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Heroic Intuition
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Your hero gets +1 THW.

card.name: Hawkeye
card.property: Hawkeye enters play with 4 arrow counters on him. Response: After a minion enters play, remove 1 arrow counter from Hawkeye â†’ deal 2 damage to that minion.

card.name: Maria Hill
card.property: Response: After Maria Hill enters play, each player draws 1 card.
"Believe it or not, we all want the same thing."

card.name: Vision
card.property: Action: Spend a [energy] resource â†’ choose THW or ATK. Until the end of the phase, Vision gets +2 to the chosen power. (Limit oncer per round.)
"I will handle this"

card.name: Get Ready
card.property: Action: Ready an ally.
"We train hard every day so that when the time comes, we'll be ready" -- Steve Rogers

card.name: Lead from the Front
card.property: Hero Action: Choose a player. Each character that player controls gets +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the phase.
"Let's go everyone!" -- Carol Danvers

card.name: Make the Call
card.property: Action: Pay the printed cost of an ally in any player's discard pile â†’ put that ally into play under your control.
"This is a code red! All hands on deck!" -- Maria Hill

card.name: The Power of Leadership
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Leadership (blue) card.

card.name: The Triskelion
card.property: Increase your ally limit by 1. (This allows you to control more than 3 allies.)
"This they made it tall enough?" -- She-Hulk

card.name: Inspired
card.property: Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.
"I'm glad she's on our side." -- Star-Lord

card.name: Black Widow
card.property: Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, exhaust Black Widow and spend a [mental] resource â†’ cancel the effects of that card and discard it. Then, reveal another card from the encounter deck.

card.name: Luke Cage
card.property: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
"Power Man for hire -- Cage speakin'.

card.name: Counter-Punch
card.property: Response (attack): After your hero defends against an enemy attack, deal damage to that enemy equal to your hero's ATK.
"That's what you get!" -- Iron Fist

card.name: Get Behind Me!
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects. The villain attacks you instead.
"Ahem! Stand aside, citizens!" -- Ms. Marvel

card.name: The Power of Protection
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Protection (green) card.

card.name: Med Team
card.property: Uses (3 medical counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card.) Action: Exhaust Med Team and remove 1 medical counter from it â†’ heal 2 damage from a friendly character.

card.name: Armored Vest
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Your hero gets +1 DEF.
Life-saving and stylish.

card.name: Indomitable
card.property: Response: After your hero defends, discard indomitable â†’ ready your hero.
"We have no choice. So we fight -- and we win. There are no other options." -- Cacptain America

card.name: Mockingbird
card.property: Response: After Mockingbird enters play, stun an enemy.

card.name: Nick Fury
card.property: Forced Response: After Nick Fury enters play, choose one: remove 2 threat from a scheme, draw 3 cards, or deal 4 damage to an enemy. At the end of the round, if Nick Fury is still in play, discard him.

card.name: Emergency
card.property: Interrupt (thwart): When the villain schemes, reduce the amount of threat placed on the scheme by 1.
"CALLING ALL UNITS! CALLING ALL UNITS!"

card.name: First Aid
card.property: Action: Heal 2 damage from any character.
"Does it still qualify as first aid if it's your second day in the hospital!" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Haymaker
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
WHAM!

card.name: Energy
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Genius
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Strength
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Avengers Mansion
card.property: Max 1 per player. Action: Exhaust Avengers Mansion â†’ choose a player. That player draws 1 card.
"Did you remember to turn off the stove?" -- Janet Van Dyne

card.name: Helicarrier
card.property: Max 1 per player. Action: Exhaust Helicarrier â†’ choose a player. Reduce the resource cost of the next card that player plays this phase by 1.
"A flying aircraft carrier? You're kidding, right?" -- Jennifer Walters

card.name: Tenacity
card.property: Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource and discard this card â†’ ready your hero.

card.name: Rhino
card.property: "I'm Rhino, I knock things down. That's what I do. That's who I am."

card.name: Rhino
card.property: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Breakin' & Takin' side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
"Out of my way!"

card.name: Rhino
card.property: Toughness (This character enter play with a tough status card.When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Breakin' & Takin' side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
"You brought this on yourself!"

card.name: The Break-In!
card.property: Contents: Rhino (I) and Rhino (II). (Rhino (II) and Rhino (III) instead for expert mode.) Rhino and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Bomb Scare). Setup: Advance to stage 1B.
Rhino is attacking a S.H.I.E.L.D. facility!

alternate.name: The Break-In!
alternate.property: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Rhino is trying to smash through the facility wall and steal a shipment of vibranium. You must stop him!

card.name: Armored Rhino Suit
card.property: Attach to Rhino. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to Rhino, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard Armored Rhino Suit.

card.name: Charge
card.property: Attach to Rhino.

card.name: Enhanced Ivory Horn
card.property: Attach to Rhino. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card

card.name: Hydra Mercenary
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)
"What is Hydra doing here?" -- Carol Danvers

card.name: Sandman
card.property: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
"I just wanna get paid!"

card.name: Shocker
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
"I bet you're shocked to see me!"

card.name: Hard to Keep Down
card.property: When Revealed: Rhino heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.
"You think you can stop me? What a joke!" -- Rhino

card.name: "I'm Tough"
card.property: When Revealed: Give Rhino a tough status card. If Rhino already has a tough status card, this card gains surge.
"Bring it!" -- Rhino

card.name: Stampede
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Rhino attacks you. If a character is damaged by this attack, that character is stunned.

card.name: Breakin' & Takin'
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Hazard Icon: Deal +1 encounter card during the villain phase.)
Rhino is breaking things and taking them!

card.name: Crowd Control
card.property: (Crisis Icon: While this scheme is in play, you cannot remove threat from the main scheme.)
Panicked civilians crowd the area. It is difficult to confront Rhino without putting them at risk. Get the people to safety!

card.name: Bomb Scare
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Acceleration Icon: Place +1 threat on the main scheme at the start of the villain phase.)
Reports are out that Hydra agents have planted a bomb in a nearby hotel.

card.name: Hydra Bomber
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.
"I know that if you cut off one head, two more will take its place. But what if it blows up instead!" -- She-Hulk

card.name: Explosion
card.property: When Revealed: If Bomb Scare is in play, assign X damage among heroes and allies, where X is the amount of threat on Bomb Scare. If Bomb Scare is not in play, this card gains surge.

card.name: False Alarm
card.property: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, this card gains surge.
"Nothing to see here people!" -- Iron Man

card.name: Klaw
card.property: "Come meet your doom!"

card.name: Klaw
card.property: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for The "Immortal" Klaw and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: Klaw
card.property: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

card.name: Underground Distribution
card.property: Contents: Klaw (I) and Klaw (II). (Klaw (II) and Klaw (III) instead for expert mode.) Klaw and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Masters of Evil) Setup: Search the encounter deck for the Defense Network side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.
The attack on the S.H.I.E.L.D. facility has been linked to an underground weapons network.

alternate.name: Underground Distribution
alternate.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
Your investigation reveals that the criminal enterprise is operated by Klaw, an old rival of the Avengers!

card.name: Secret Rendezvous
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player. Advance to stage 2B
Klaw has found a buyer for his illegal weapons. It's up to you to stop the sale but the meeting is surrounded by Klaw's cronies.

alternate.name: Secret Rendezvous
alternate.property: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Klaw is meeting with the Crimson Cowl. Klaw and the mysterious figure dart into the shadows when you confront them, and Klaw's minions move to cover their escape.

card.name: Sonic Converter
card.property: Attach to Klaw. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Solid-Sound Body
card.property: Attach to Klaw. Klaw gains retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.) Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Armored Guard
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

card.name: Weapons Runner
card.property: Surge. (After this card is revealed, reveal 1 additional encounter card.)

card.name: Klaw's Vengeance
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard 1 card at random from your hand. When Revealed (Hero): Klaw attacks you. If this attack does damage, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Sonic Boom
card.property: When Revealed: Either spend [energy] [mental] [physical] or exhaust each character you control.

card.name: Sound Manipulation
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Klaw heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Take 2 damage. Klaw heals 2 damage.

card.name: Defense Network
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
Klaw's criminal enterprise is protected by a gang of hired thugs.

card.name: Illegal Arms Factory
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
Klaw is supplying villains with advanced weaponry from a clandestine arms facility.

card.name: The "Immortal" Klaw
card.property: Klaw gets +10 hit points. (When this scheme is defeated, Klaw loses those hit points.)
Klaw's mastery of sound allows him to restore his solid form through sheer power of will.

card.name: The Masters of Evil
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Masters of Evil]] minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
The Masters of Evil have arrived to attack the heroes!

card.name: Masters of Mayhem
card.property: When Revealed: Each [[Masters of Evil]] minion attacks the hero it is engaged with. If no attacks were made this way, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Masters of Evil]] minion and put it into play engaged with you, the shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: Ultron
card.property: Each [[Drone]] minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Ultron cannot take damage while a [[Drone]] minion is in play. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Ultron's Imperative side scheme and reveal it. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: The Crimson Cowl
card.property: Contents: Ultron (I) and Ultron (II). (Ultron (II) and Ultron (III) instead foar expert mode.) Ultron and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Under Attack). Setup: Put the Ultron Drones environment into play. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advanced to stage 1B.
Klaw's mysterious, red-hooded employer is really the genocidal android Ultron.

alternate.name: The Crimson Cowl
alternate.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
Ultron is using the components Klaw delivered in order to build an army of Ultron drones.

card.name: Assault on NORAD
card.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 2B.
As you pursue Ultron, you receive a distress call from the North American Aerospace Defense Command in Colorado. They are besieged by an army of Ultron drones!

alternate.name: Assault on NORAD
alternate.property: Forced Response: After placing threat here during step one of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or put the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
If Ultron gains control of NORAD, he will have access to the United States' ballistic missile command!

card.name: Countdown to Oblivion
card.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 3B.
Ultron has seized control of NORAD. It's only a matter of time before he overcomes the command safeguards and launches the nuclear arsenal.

alternate.name: Countdown to Oblivion
alternate.property: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game
It's up to you to save the world from nuclear armageddon!

card.name: Ultron Drones
card.property: Each facedown [[Drone]] minion engaged with a player has a base SCH of 1, a base ATK of 1, and a base hit points of 1. Forced Response: After a facedown [[Drone]] minion is defeated, place that card in it's owners discard pile.

card.name: Program Transmitter
card.property: Attach to Ultron. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental] [mental] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Upgraded Drones
card.property: Attach to the Ultron Drones environment. Each facedown [[Drone]] minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Advanced Ultron Drone
card.property: Guard. Forced Interrupt: When Advanced Ultron Drone is defeated, the engaged player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.

card.name: Android Efficiency
card.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.

card.name: Android Efficiency
card.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.

card.name: Android Efficiency
card.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.

card.name: Rage of Ultron
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Ultron schemes. Discard the top card of your deck for each threat placed this way. When Revelaed (Hero): Ultron attacks you. Discard the top card of your deck for each damage dealt by this attack.

card.name: Repair Sequence
card.property: When Revealed: Ultron heals 2 damage for each [[Drone]] minion engaged with you. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Swarm Attack
card.property: When Revealed: Each [[Drone]] minion engaged with your hero attacks. If no attack was made this way, put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

card.name: Drone Factory
card.property: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Place 1 threat here for each [[Drone]] minion in play.

card.name: Invasive AI
card.property: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck.
Ultron is hacking wireless networks around the world to create a global crisis.

card.name: Ultron's Imperative
card.property: When Revealed: The first player puts the top 2 cards of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as [[Drone]] minions.
Ultron directs his drone army through hive circuity.

card.name: Under Attack
card.property: When Revealed: Each player chooses to either place 2 threat here or deal 3 damage to their hero.
Civilians are under attack. They need your help fast!

card.name: Vibranium Armor
card.property: Attach to the villain. Forced Response: After the villain take damage, give it a tough status card. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [physical] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Concussion Blasters
card.property: Attach to the villain. The villain gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [energy] [energy] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Concussive Blast
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each friendly character.

card.name: Affairs of State
card.property: Give to the T'Challa player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust T'Challa â†’ remove Affairs of State from the game. - Choose and discard a [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Usurp The Throne
card.property: The renegade, Killmonger, is leading a coup to seize control of Wakanda.

card.name: Killmonger
card.property: Killmonger cannot take damage from [[Black Panther]] upgrades.
"That should be me on the throne!"

card.name: Heart-Shaped Herb
card.property: Surge (After this card resolves, reveal 1 additional encounter card) When Revealed: Give the villain and each minion engaged with you a tough status card.

card.name: Ritual Combat
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Then, choose to either deal X damage to your hero or place X threat on the main scheme. X is 1 more than the number of boost icons on the discarded encounter card.

card.name: Legal Work
card.property: Give to the Jennifer Walters player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Jennifer Walters â†’ remove Legal Work from the game. - Give the main scheme 1 acceleration token. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Personal Challenge
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
Titania had held a grudge against She-Hulk for years. She won't rest until she settles the score.

card.name: Titania
card.property: X is equal to Titania's remaining hit points.
"Face it, Greenie. There's only room for one strongest woman... and it ain't you!"

card.name: Genetically Enhanced
card.property: Attach to the minion with the highest printed hit points. If there are no minions in play, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +3 hit points.

card.name: Titania's Fury
card.property: When Revealed: Titania attacks your hero. If Titania did not attack, heal all damage from Titania and this card gains surge.
"This world now belongs to the Kree empire!" -- Yon-Rogg

card.name: Eviction Notice
card.property: Give to the Peter Parker player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Peter Parker â†’ remove Eviction Notice from the game. - Discard 1 card at random from your hand. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Highway Robbery
card.property: When Revealed: Each player places a random card from their hand facedown here. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vulture
card.property: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks.)
"I'm faster, strong, and smarter than a hundred men my age!"

card.name: Sweeping Swoop
card.property: When Revealed: Stun your hero. If Vulture is in play, this card gains surge.

card.name: The Vulture's Plans
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from each player's hand. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different resource type discarded this way.
"Spider-Man will pay for interfering with my plans!" -- The Vulture

card.name: Business Problems
card.property: Give to the Tony Stark player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Tony Stark â†’ remove Business Problems from the game. - Exhaust each upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Imminent Overload
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
Whiplash has seized control of a power plant, threatening to overload the transformers if his demands are not met.

card.name: Whiplash
card.property: Retaliate 1 (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)
"You started this, Tony. I will finish it."

card.name: Electric Whip Attack
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either deal 1 damage to your hero for each upgrade you control or choose and discard an upgrade you control.

card.name: Electromagnetic Backlash
card.property: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck. For each printed [energy] resource a player discards this way, that player takes 1 damage.
Five, four, three, two...

card.name: Family Emergency
card.property: Give to the Carol Danvers player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Carol Danvers â†’ remove Family Emergency from the game. - You are stunned. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: The Psych-Magnitron
card.property: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
The Psych-Magnitron is a Kree device with the power to turn thoughts into reality. In the hands of Yon-Rogg, it would be a devestating weapon.

card.name: Yon-Rogg
card.property: [star] Forced Response: After Yon-Rogg attacks, place 1 threat on The Psych-Magnitron.
"It isn't real power unles they fear you"

card.name: Kree Manipulator
card.property: Surge. (After this card resolves, reveal 1 additional encounter card.) When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Yon-Rogg's Treason
card.property: When Revealed: Discard each [energy] resource from your hand. If you discarded no cards this way, this card gains surge.
"This world now belongs to the Kree empire!" -- Yon-Rogg

card.name: Legions of Hydra
card.property: When Revealed: If Madame Hydra is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Madame Hydra and put her into play engaged with you, then shuffle the encounter deck. Place 2 additional threat here for each [[Hydra]] enemy in play.

card.name: Madame Hydra
card.property: Madame Hydra cannot take damage while the Legions of Hydra side scheme is in play.

card.name: Hydra Soldier
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

card.name: The Doomsday Chair
card.property: When Revealed: If MODOK is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for MODOK and put him into play engaged with you, then shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: MODOK
card.property: Retaliate 2. (After this character is attacked, deal 2 damage to the attacking character.)

card.name: Biomechanical Upgrades
card.property: Surge. Attach to the minion with the highest printed hit points and without another Biomechanical Upgrades attachment. Forced Interrupt: When attached minion would be defeated, heal all damage from it instead, this discard this card.

card.name: Advance
card.property: When Revealed: The villain schemes.
"The world will be mine!" -- Red Skull

card.name: Assault
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revelaed (Hero): The villain attacks you.
"Die!" -- Venom

card.name: Caught Off Guard
card.property: When Revealed: Discard an upgrade or support you control. If no cards were discarded this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Gang-Up
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revelaed (Hero): The villain and each minion engaged with you attacks you.

card.name: Shadow of the Past
card.property: When Revealed: Reveal your set-aside nemesis minion and put it into play engaged with you. Reveal your set-aside nemesis side scheme and put it into play. Shuffle the rest of your set-aside nemesis encounter set into the encounter deck. If your nemesis minion does not enter the game this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.property: Surge. When Revealed: Exhaust your identity card.

card.name: Masterplan
card.property: When Revealed: Place 4 threat on each side scheme. If there are no side schemes in play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side scheme is discarded. Reveal that side scheme.

card.name: Under Fire
card.property: Surge. When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
